standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no clear designation, salary, or reporting structure
standard_clauses.plain_english: Employment contract must clearly state designation, salary, and terms.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: रोजगार अनुबंध में पदनाम, वेतन और शर्तें स्पष्ट रूप से बताई जानी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Employee is appointed as [Designation] with a monthly CTC of INR [Amount].

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no PF contribution for establishments with 20+ employees
standard_clauses.plain_english: Employer must contribute 12% of basic salary to EPF for establishments with 20+ employees.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: 20+ कर्मचारियों वाले प्रतिष्ठानों के लिए नियोक्ता को मूल वेतन का 12% EPF में योगदान करना होगा।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Company shall contribute to the Employee's Provident Fund as per the EPF Act 1952.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: non-compete clause extending beyond employment period
standard_clauses.plain_english: Post-employment non-compete clauses are generally unenforceable in India.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: रोजगार के बाद की गैर-प्रतिस्पर्धा शर्तें भारत में सामान्यतः लागू नहीं होतीं।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The non-compete obligations shall apply only during the term of employment.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: notice period exceeds 3 months or is asymmetric
standard_clauses.plain_english: Notice period should be reasonable and symmetric for both parties.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: नोटिस अवधि उचित होनी चाहिए और दोनों पक्षों के लिए समान होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Either party may terminate employment by giving [X] months written notice or salary in lieu thereof.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no gratuity provision after 5 years of service
standard_clauses.plain_english: Employees completing 5 years are entitled to gratuity payment.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: 5 वर्ष पूरे करने वाले कर्मचारी ग्रेच्युटी भुगतान के हकदार हैं।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Gratuity shall be payable as per the Payment of Gratuity Act 1972 upon completion of 5 years.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: working hours exceed 48 per week or 9 per day
standard_clauses.plain_english: Maximum working hours: 8 hours/day, 48 hours/week. Overtime must be compensated.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: अधिकतम कार्य घंटे: 8 घंटे/दिन, 48 घंटे/सप्ताह। ओवरटाइम का मुआवजा दिया जाना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Working hours shall not exceed 48 hours per week. Overtime beyond 8 hours/day shall be compensated.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: annual leave less than 15 days or no sick leave
standard_clauses.plain_english: Employees are entitled to minimum annual leave and sick leave as per law.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: कर्मचारी कानून के अनुसार न्यूनतम वार्षिक छुट्टी और बीमार छुट्टी के हकदार हैं।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Employee shall be entitled to [X] days of paid annual leave and [Y] days of sick leave per year.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no ESIC for employees with monthly wages below 21000
standard_clauses.plain_english: ESIC coverage mandatory for employees earning below Rs 21,000/month in applicable establishments.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: लागू प्रतिष्ठानों में 21,000 रुपये/माह से कम कमाने वाले कर्मचारियों के लिए ESIC कवरेज अनिवार्य।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Company shall register the Employee under ESIC as per the ESI Act 1948 where applicable.

standard_clauses.plain_english: Probation period should generally not exceed 6 months.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: परिवीक्षा अवधि सामान्यतः 6 महीने से अधिक नहीं होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Employee shall be on probation for [X] months, not exceeding six (6) months.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: termination at will without cause or due process
standard_clauses.plain_english: Termination must follow due process. At-will termination without cause may violate labour laws.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: समाप्ति उचित प्रक्रिया का पालन करनी चाहिए। बिना कारण इच्छानुसार समाप्ति श्रम कानूनों का उल्लंघन हो सकता है।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Employment may be terminated for cause with written notice specifying grounds.
